summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 5th Avenue North, from Denny Way to the alley between Aloha Street and Ward Street; by the installation of a street lighting system; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8081 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
